name: Flipper Hazard 4
description:
Flipper Hazard 4 is a sequel to Flipper Hazard 3 which brings completely new stages and levels into play!

Control 2 or even 4 pads to pass the levels and achieve their goals. Raise your score by hitting the score raising objects on your way. Watch over your pinballs so you don't run out of them. At the start of the level, you get in the control of a single pinball with which you play and collect points. You can hit point objects with it or lock into special deal positions. You just need to be careful not to lose it by letting it pass by your controllers.

Prepare for hazards and clear all the stages!
